armor_leather.name: Leather Armor
armor_leather.description: Armor made from tanned animal hide. It smells a bit funny, but it'd do the job.

armor_old_iron_armor.name: Iron armor
armor_old_iron_armor.description: Armor that used to be worn by the old gardener when he was still a guard.

armor_steel_armor.name: Steel armor
armor_steel_armor.description: Fine armor used by the captain. Well he no longer needs it.
